Address.label: Address
Address.value: 200 BURRARD STREET,1800 WATERFRONT CENTRE, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6C 3M1, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Methanex Corp manufactures and sells methanol. Methanex's customers use methanol as a feedstock to produce end-products including adhesives, foams, solvents, and windshield washer fluids. The firm also sells its products to the oil refining industry, where the methanol is blended with gasoline to produce a high-octane fuel or blended as a component of biodiesel. Methanex distributes its products through a global supply chain that includes the operation of port terminals, tankers, barges, rail cars, trucks, and pipelines. China generates the most revenue of any geographical segment.
